Method Detail

addWordCategory

public long addWordCategory(WordCategory word_category,
                            java.lang.String user_id,
                            java.lang.String subject,
                            java.lang.String current_dir,
                            java.lang.String encoding)
This method creates a new category file with the name contained in the WordCategory file. If other members are set, they are also recorded in the file. Otherwise, the id and creation time are created in this method and a blank word_id tag is created. We also create an entry in the categories.xml index file outside the categories folder.

Specified by:
addWordCategory in interface WordCategoriesManager

createWordCategoryElement

private org.jdom.Element createWordCategoryElement(WordCategory word_category)
Create Word Category Element. If there is not time set, a new time is created. If category words contains a vector of SimpleWord objects, those are added, otherwise a blank category_words element is created. ** the file name so we dont save it in the file (redundante, duh!) exclusive 0000000000002 random.xml
